channel.title: Business VoIP on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Business VoIP on 0x000216

item.title: Enterprise SIP Trunking Consolidates Phone Lines
item.description: When was the last time you examined your telephone network? And I don’t mean just looking at your bills for excessive long-distance usage or disconnected lines. I’m talking about a thorough review of your phone system’s infrastructure and its connections. If you have multiple locations, you might unknowingly be tangled in a web of connections that drain your budget every month. This is especially common for companies that have expanded through acquisitions, where each site might have a completely different setup, leading to unnecessary expenses.

item.title: What XO’s 1,000,000 VoIP Customers Predicts
item.description: XO Communications, a leading competitor in the telecom industry, recently celebrated a significant achievement: reaching one million business VoIP users. Reaching this milestone in just five years surprised even XO. This rapid adoption might be unexpected for those hesitant about embracing VoIP technology. We’ve all experienced the downsides of poorly implemented VoIP – distortion, dropped calls, and poor sound quality. However, successful implementations demonstrate that these issues are avoidable. After all, a million businesses can’t be wrong.
